channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Rational Quality Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Rational Quality Manager

item.title: CVE-2017-1314|2024-08-05T13:32:29.648Z -- ibm -- rational%20quality%20manager
item.description: IBM Rational Quality Manager and IBM Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management 5.0 through 5.0.2 and 6.0 through 6.0.5 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 125725.

item.title: CVE-2017-1100|2024-08-05T13:25:17.285Z -- ibm -- rational%20quality%20manager
item.description: IBM Quality Manager (RQM) 4.0, 5.0, and 6.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 120661.

item.title: CVE-2018-1759|2024-08-05T04:07:44.323Z -- ibm -- rational%20quality%20manager
item.description: IBM Rational Quality Manager 5.0 through 6.0.6 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. item.title: CVE-2017-1248|2024-08-05T13:25:17.597Z -- ibm -- rational%20quality%20manager
item.description: IBM Quality Manager (RQM) 5.0.x and 6.0 through 6.0.5 are vulnerable to HTML injection. A remote attacker could inject malicious HTML code, which when viewed, would be executed in the victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting site. IBM X-Force ID: 124628.

item.title: CVE-2017-1725|2024-08-05T13:39:32.154Z -- ibm -- rational%20quality%20manager
item.description: IBM Jazz Team Server affecting the following IBM Rational Products: Collaborative Lifecycle Management (CLM), Rational DOORS Next Generation (RDNG), Rational Engineering Lifecycle Manager (RELM), Rational Team Concert (RTC), Rational Quality Manager (RQM), Rational Rhapsody Design Manager (Rhapsody DM), and Rational Software Architect (RSA DM) contain an undisclosed vulnerability with the potential for information disclosure. IBM X-Force ID: 134820.

item.title: CVE-2017-1239|2024-08-05T13:25:17.508Z -- ibm -- rational%20quality%20manager
item.description: IBM Quality Manager (RQM) 5.0.x and 6.0 through 6.0.5 could reveal sensitive information in HTTP 500 Internal Server Error responses. IBM X-Force ID: 124357.

item.title: CVE-2017-1101|2024-08-05T13:25:17.132Z -- ibm -- rational%20quality%20manager
item.description: IBM Quality Manager (RQM) 4.0, 5.0, and 6.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. item.title: CVE-2018-1549|2024-08-05T04:07:43.881Z -- ibm -- rational%20quality%20manager
item.description: IBM Rational Quality Manager 5.0 through 5.0.2 and 6.0 through 6.0.5 are vulnerable to HTTP response splitting attacks. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using specially-crafted URL to cause the server to return a split response, once the URL is clicked. This would allow the attacker to perform further attacks, such as Web cache poisoning, cross-site scripting, and possibly obtain sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 142658.
